direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve creating a new Document instance with a base URI.

Both methods access and manipulate the HTML structure of the Document.
Both methods modify the state of the Document by adding or ensuring the presence of specific elements.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require a base URI as input, which can be reused for setting up tests.
The appendElement method is invoked within createShell to add elements, indicating a dependency on execution order.
The htmlEl method ensures the presence of the root HTML element, which can be used to verify the structure created by createShell.
